job description:
Machine Learning Engineer
If you are a Machine Learning Engineer with experience, please read on!

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • Highly competitive compensation and benefits package.
  • Opportunity to work on highly dynamic innovations in AI - Autonomous Driving.
  • Unlimited PTO.
What You Will Be Doing
Constant focus on deployment and Iteration on novel unsupervised learning algorithms at petabyte scale.

Highly intensive collaboration with the research team to implement and maintain a steady stream of deep learning experiments.

Own and develop to maintain petabyte scale data/training/experiment analysis infrastructure on EC2

What You Need for this Position
Less Than 1 Year of experience and knowledge of:
  • Neural Networks
  • Tensorflow
  • ML Toolkits
  • Python
  • R
  • Statistics
  • Mathematics
  • Petabyte Scale
  • AWS
What's In It for You
  • Vacation/PTO
  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Relocation
  • Bonus
  • 401k
So, if you are a Machine Learning Engineer with experience, please apply today!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
